name: 書報討論（一）
description: 1. Capable of understanding a scientific paper and able to present it. 2. Introduce current research in chemistry.
goals: This course is designed to help students to be capable of doing a good scientific presentation.
Capable of understanding a scientific paper and able to present it.
syllabus:
The selection of reading materials will cover the following topics:   

1. Global Energy and Climate Change

2. Other Energy Resource and Consequence

3. Solar Energy and Photosynthesis in Biology

4. Solar Energy Conversion by Manmade Device

5. Water Oxidation

6. Hydrogen Production

7. Hydride Generation and Carbon Dioxide Reduction

8. Hydrogen Storage

9\. Fuel Cell
